event.description: Ian Kinsler pops out to shortstop Alexei Ramirez in foul territory.
Omar Vizquel strikes out swinging.
Marlon Byrd strikes out swinging.
Andruw Jones grounds out, shortstop Alexei Ramirez to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Hank Blalock singles on a ground ball to second baseman Chris Getz. Hank Blalock advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by second baseman Chris Getz.
Nelson Cruz grounds out, shortstop Alexei Ramirez to first baseman Paul Konerko.
David Murphy strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia grounds out, third baseman Josh Fields to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Elvis Andrus walks.
Ian Kinsler flies out to center fielder Scott Podsednik.
Omar Vizquel bunt grounds out, pitcher John Danks to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Marlon Byrd strikes out swinging.
Andruw Jones strikes out swinging.
Hank Blalock flies out to left fielder Carlos Quentin.
Nelson Cruz doubles (6) on a ground ball to left fielder Carlos Quentin.
David Murphy called out on strikes.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia strikes out swinging.
Elvis Andrus singles on a ground ball to center fielder Scott Podsednik. Nelson Cruz scores.
Ian Kinsler strikes out swinging.
Omar Vizquel singles on a ground ball to shortstop Alexei Ramirez, deflected by pitcher John Danks.
Marlon Byrd strikes out swinging.
Andruw Jones strikes out swinging.
With Hank Blalock batting, Omar Vizquel steals (2) 2nd base.
Hank Blalock grounds out, shortstop Alexei Ramirez to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Pitching Change: Matt Thornton replaces John Danks.
Nelson Cruz called out on strikes.
David Murphy strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia singles on a ground ball to left fielder Carlos Quentin.
Elvis Andrus walks. Jarrod Saltalamacchia to 2nd.
Ian Kinsler singles on a fly ball to right fielder Jermaine Dye. Jarrod Saltalamacchia scores. Elvis Andrus to 3rd.
Omar Vizquel flies out to center fielder Scott Podsednik.
Pitching Change: Scott Linebrink replaces Matt Thornton.
Marlon Byrd singles on a ground ball to center fielder Scott Podsednik.
With Andruw Jones batting, Marlon Byrd steals (1) 2nd base.
Andruw Jones pops out to first baseman Paul Konerko in foul territory.
Scott Linebrink intentionally walks Hank Blalock.
Nelson Cruz flies out to center fielder Scott Podsednik.
David Murphy flies out to right fielder Jermaine Dye.
Pitching Change: Bobby Jenks replaces Scott Linebrink.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chris Davis replaces Elvis Andrus.
Chris Davis strikes out swinging.
Ian Kinsler pops out to second baseman Chris Getz.
Scott Podsednik grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Hank Blalock.
Chris Getz flies out to left fielder David Murphy.
Carlos Quentin grounds out, third baseman Omar Vizquel to first baseman Hank Blalock.
Jermaine Dye walks.
Jim Thome strikes out swinging.
Paul Konerko singles on a ground ball to center fielder Marlon Byrd. Jermaine Dye to 3rd.
A. J. Pierzynski walks. Paul Konerko to 2nd.
Josh Fields pops into a double play, second baseman Ian Kinsler to shortstop Elvis Andrus. Paul Konerko doubled off 2nd.
Alexei Ramirez flies out to left fielder David Murphy.
Scott Podsednik grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Hank Blalock.
Chris Getz hit by pitch.
Carlos Quentin doubles (2) on a fly ball to center fielder Marlon Byrd. Chris Getz scores.
Jermaine Dye flies out to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
Jim Thome doubles (4) on a line drive to right fielder Nelson Cruz.
Paul Konerko grounds out softly, pitcher Kevin Millwood to first baseman Hank Blalock.
A. J. Pierzynski lines into a double play, second baseman Ian Kinsler to shortstop Elvis Andrus. Jim Thome doubled off 2nd.
Josh Fields grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Hank Blalock.
Alexei Ramirez called out on strikes.
Scott Podsednik grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Hank Blalock.
Chris Getz flies out to left fielder David Murphy.
Carlos Quentin doubles (3) on a line drive to left fielder David Murphy.
Jermaine Dye doubles (3) on a fly ball to center fielder Marlon Byrd. Carlos Quentin scores.
Jim Thome walks.
Paul Konerko flies out to left fielder David Murphy.
A. J. Pierzynski grounds into a force out, fielded by shortstop Elvis Andrus. Jim Thome out at 2nd.
Josh Fields pops out to second baseman Ian Kinsler.
Alexei Ramirez flies out to right fielder Nelson Cruz.
Scott Podsednik flies out to left fielder David Murphy.
Chris Getz singles on a line drive to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
Carlos Quentin hit by pitch. Chris Getz to 2nd.
Jermaine Dye singles on a line drive to right fielder Nelson Cruz. Chris Getz to 3rd. Carlos Quentin to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Derek Holland replaces Kevin Millwood.
Jim Thome grounds into a force out, second baseman Ian Kinsler to catcher Jarrod Saltalamacchia. Chris Getz out at home. Carlos Quentin to 3rd. Jermaine Dye to 2nd. Jim Thome to 1st.
Pitching Change: Darren O'Day replaces Derek Holland.
Paul Konerko out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Marlon Byrd. Carlos Quentin scores.
A. J. Pierzynski strikes out on a foul tip.
